projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This ticket should summarize, what's necessary to make Hyperloop available without the usage of Titanium Mobile. Currently, we are hooking Hyperloop into the Ti build-process, allowing it to act independently therefore needs:
- Own CLI
- Creation of the AppDelegate
- Handling of assets

Just like ALOY-1488, it's a huge task, but it's here for discussion.
fields.summary: Hyperloop: Allow Hyperloop usage without Titanium Mobile
